long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides easy and simple tab organization by combining all tabs from a shared domain, and places them juxtaposed within your browser window. Domains with the largest number of shared tabs are leftmost, and domains with few (or even one) open tabs are rightmost. Organization is executed by clicking the Toupe icon in your browser window or via the command shortcut Cmd + Shift + O (Ctrl + Shift + O on windows).
